author: Les Bennyness
content:
It gets said a lot, but it really is Manchester’s best kept secret. It’d be worth moving to Manchester for
I’ve been popping here for just over 20 years). The food is always so fresh and delicious and service is cheerful and prompt. Price wise, for a city, it’s fantastically cheap (3 curries and rice for £7.50? Incredible!) And those onion bhajis? Oh my days! Get me there now!
